request.name: destroy
request.description: This request destroys the gamma control manager.

request.name: destroy
request.description: This request destroys the gamma control.

request.name: set_gamma
request.description: Request to set the current gamma ramps of an output. The arraays contain uint16_t values. Each array represents the color ramp for one color (red, green and blue). All arrays must have the same size.

event.name: gamma_size
event.description: Reports the number of uint16_t elements in each gamma ramp for each color.
